publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6065 Willie Coffey: Rathbone Achievers Awards—That the Parliament congratulates all of the winners in this year’s Rathbone Scotland Achievers of the Year 2010 awards, including young achievers Emily Paterson from Kilmarnock, Liam Murray and Lisa Keogh from Dundee, Thomas Hodge from Fife and Jake Duncanson from Edinburgh, Rathbone’s Employee and Volunteer of the Year, Niki Gray and Junior Robertson, respectively, and employers Arnold Clark of Dundee and Johnston Brown of Glasgow; recognises the achievement of the young award-winners who have overcome difficult circumstances to build a positive future for themselves; believes that the commitment of Rathbone’s staff and volunteers plays a vital role in helping these young people succeed; notes the importance of Rathbone’s partnerships with employers in providing young people with the opportunity to progress, and wishes Rathbone every success in continuing to improve the life chances of young people in Scotland.

S3M-6065 Willie Coffey: Rathbone Achievers Awards—That the Parliament congratulates all of the winners in this year’s Rathbone Scotland Achievers of the Year 2010 awards, including young achievers Emily Paterson from Kilmarnock, Liam Murray and Lisa Keogh from Dundee, Thomas Hodge from Fife and Jake Duncanson from Edinburgh, Rathbone’s Employee and Volunteer of the Year, Niki Gray and Junior Robertson, respectively, and employers Arnold Clark of Dundee and Johnston Brown of Glasgow; recognises the achievement of the young award-winners who have overcome difficult circumstances to build a positive future for themselves; believes that the commitment of Rathbone’s staff and volunteers plays a vital role in helping these young people succeed; notes the importance of Rathbone’s partnerships with employers in providing young people with the opportunity to progress, and wishes Rathbone every success in continuing to improve the life chances of young people in Scotland.

S3M-6065 Rathbone Achievers Awards (lodged on 25 March 2010) Stewart Maxwell*, Aileen Campbell*, Nanette Milne*, Ken Macintosh*, Kenneth Gibson*, Karen Whitefield*, Robin Harper*, Bill Kidd*, Rob Gibson*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Gil Paterson*, Margaret Mitchell*, Bob Doris*, David Whitton*, Sandra White*, Maureen Watt*
